name: Giving Gladly
description: Effective Altruism blog by Julia Wise

name: Jeff Kaufman's Blog
description: Effective Altruism blog by Jeff Kaufman

name: The Life You Can Save: How to Do Your Part to End World Poverty
description: Provides ethical arguments, illuminating examples, and case studies of charitable giving to show that our current response to world poverty is not only insufficient but morally indefensible.

name: The Most Good You Can Do: How Effective Altruism Is Changing Ideas About Living Ethically The Most Good You Can Do: How Effective Altruism Is Changing Ideas
description: Book about people who are restructuring their lives in accordance with Effective Altruism.

name: Famine, Affluence, and Morality
description: Essay by Peter Singer who argues that affluent persons are morally obligated to donate far more resources to humanitarian causes than is considered normal in Western cultures.

name: Doing Good Better: How Effective Altruism Can Help You Help Others, Do Work that Matters, and Make Smarter Choices about Giving Back
description: William MacAskill explains why most of our ideas about how to make a difference are wrong and presents a counterintuitive way for each of us to do the most good possible.

name: Strangers Drowning: Impossible Idealism, Drastic Choices, and the Urge to Help
description: Larissa MacFarquhar seeks out people living lives of extreme ethical commitment and tells their deeply intimate stories; their stubborn integrity and their compromises; their bravery and their recklessness; their joys and defeats and wrenching dilemmas.

name: GiveWell
description: Non-profit charity evaluator and effective altruism-focused organization.

name: Charity Science
description: Accessible pop science introduction to the science of picking and evaluating charities.

name: Animal Charity Evaluators
description: Find resources and recommendations on the top animal charities and interventions.

name: Effective Altruism Forum
description: Effective Altruism Q&A Forum.

name: Effective Altruism Facebook Group
description: Effective Altruism Facebook Group.

name: Effective Altruism Wiki
description: Wiki run by Effective Altruism Hub.

name: EA Hub
description: Hosts and points to a range of resources and projects for effective altruists.

name: The Life You Can Save
description: Peter Singer's organization devoted to providing information about and promoting participation in activities that reduce poverty and economic inequality.

name: Giving What We Can
description: Organization whose members pledge to give 10% of their income to effective charities.

description: Runs EA Global, Effective Altruism Funds, effectivealtruism.org; defines Effective Altruism Concepts.

name: Good Ventures
description: Private foundation and philanthropic organization in San Francisco co-founded by Cari Tuna and Dustin Moskovitz, one of the co-founders of Facebook.

name: Open Philanthropy Project
description: A vehicle to direct the funding done by Good Ventures.

description: Calculator created by The Life You Can Save to show how much impact one can make by donation.
